mapper.select: SELECT EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.PRM_CD AS prmCd /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.ANSWER_NUM AS answerNum /* 답변 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER /* 프로모션 설문 참여자 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.PRM_CD = #{prmCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER /* 프로모션 설문 참여자 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.PRM_CD = #{prmCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.PRM_CD AS prmCd /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.ANSWER_NUM AS answerNum /* 답변 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER /* 프로모션 설문 참여자 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.PRM_CD = #{param.prmCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.USER_ID = #{param.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
ORDER BY EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER.PRM_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER SET /* 프로모션 설문 참여자 */ ANSWER_NUM = #{answerNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 답변 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ WHERE 1=1 AND PRM_CD = #{prmCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_PRM_SURVEY_USER /* 프로모션 설문 참여자 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PRM_CD = #{prmCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 프로모션 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
